ygData.subject: Re: Alcohol Tolerance
ygData.msgSnippet: Ya the most I ve seen so far is +2Str & +2Sta with -20-30 Int.  I ve wondered if with additional AH if you just gain more Str & Sta,  if you gain it longer or
ygData.messageBody:
Ya the most I've seen so far is +2Str & +2Sta with -20-30 Int. I've wondered if with additional AH if you just gain more Str & Sta, if you gain it longer or just have less debilitating effects (loss of int etc). My AH is 20+ as I get it higher I'll let the list know what I find out. I also just like being a sword swinging, ale drinkin fool.

I've also learned don't drink alot in Kethelin...if you do you'll fall right on out of the tree city *ouch*
